bibl.title: Medinet Madi: Site of the Castrum Narmoutheos.
bibl.note: Archaeological mission of Pisa University, in collaboration with Messina University, 2006-2007. Identification and investigation of the Castrum Narmoutheos, attested in the Notitia Dignitatum and in papyri.
bibl.seg: BRESCIANI Edda and Rosario PINTAUDI, Medinet Madi: Site of the Castrum Narmoutheos.
Egyptian Archaeology 31 (2007) pp. 30-32, 1 fig. n./bl., 7 figg. coul., 1 plan.

Archaeological mission of Pisa University, in collaboration with Messina University, 2006-2007. Identification and investigation of the Castrum Narmoutheos, attested in the Notitia Dignitatum and in papyri.
